Name: Duguay-Trouin
Draught: 6.14 m (20 ft 2 in), 6.30 m (20 ft 8 in) full load
Propulsion: 4-shaft Parsons single-reduction geared turbines; 8 Guyot boilers; 102,000 shp (76,000 kW)
Range: 3,000 nautical miles (6,000 km) at 15 knots (28 km/h)
Armament:
8 × 155 mm (6.1 in)/50 guns (4 × 2)
4 × 75 mm (3 in) anti-aircraft guns (4 × 1)
12 × 550 mm (22 in) torpedo tubes (4 × 3)
Armour:
Deck: 20 mm (0.79 in)
Magazine box: 30 mm (1.2 in)
Turrets and conning tower: 30 mm (1.2 in)
